summary: Create a game featuring Sonic and Tails fighting.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Arcade fighting stage background with dynamic lighting and motion lines (stage-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Blue hedgehog-like fighter sprite sheet, 6-frame grid, transparent background (hedgehog-fighter-sprites.dim_768x512.png)
- Orange two-tailed fox-like fighter sprite sheet, 6-frame grid, transparent background (fox-fighter-sprites.dim_768x512.png)
- HUD panel elements: two health bar frames and a center round indicator, transparent background (hud-elements.dim_1024x256.png)

existing_features.title: Create a playable local 2D fighting game in the React frontend with two characters (a blue hedgehog-like character and an orange two-tailed fox-like character) that can fight each other on the same keyboard.
Implement core combat mechanics: movement, jumping, facing direction, basic attacks, hit detection, damage, knockback, health bars, round/win state, and match reset.
Add a simple game UI: title/start screen, controls/help overlay, in-match HUD (names + health), pause/resume, and game-over screen. Use English for all on-screen text.

Add a coherent visual theme for the game UI and scene (colors, typography, layout) and apply it consistently across start screen, HUD, overlays, and game-over screen (avoid a blue/purple-dominant palette).
Use generated static art assets (background + character sprites) stored under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the game (fighters and stage).

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a fighting game featuring Sonic and Tails as playable characters.
